Quickstrike:




Quickstrike gasped as he heard Black Arachnia's voice. He turned his head to 
her, with his eyes bright. "Uuh, no, we're fine." The curving strips at the 
side of his cheeks quivered. "Jus' uh little tired wit' these tin-horn's 
attitudes, ya know what ah mean? Don't wanna do their job." He shook his 
head, trying to change the subject.

What should he say? He wanted to be with her again, but somewhere in his 
brain he thought that was stupid. He once hated her.

"So, uuh...didn't mean t' leave ya back there. Duty called." He chuckled. 
"Ya want'd t' talk?"
